cause.description:
It's pretty self explanatory. If someone feels strongly about religion and you don't, pretend to have the exact opposite views as them. Or do whatever it takes to piss them off. Cuss a lot, talk about worshipping Satan and sacrificing children, animals, whatever. You are encouraged to be creative.
1. Making people angry is fun.
2. Most hyperreligious people take themselves waaaay too seriously.
cause.name: Pissing off religious people
